trans-unit.source: Python Web and Worker Roles with Python Tools 2.1 for Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Python Web and Worker Roles with Python Tools 2.1 for Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Overview of using Python Tools for Visual Studio to create Azure cloud services including web roles and worker roles.
trans-unit.target: Overview of using Python Tools for Visual Studio to create Azure cloud services including web roles and worker roles.

trans-unit.source: Python-Web und Worker-Funktionen mit Python Tools 2.1 für Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Python-Web und Worker-Funktionen mit Python Tools 2.1 für Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Dieses Handbuch enthält eine Übersicht zur Verwendung von Python-Web und Worker-Rollen mit <link><linkText>Python-Tools für Visual Studio[]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Dieses Handbuch enthält eine Übersicht zur Verwendung von Python-Web und Worker-Rollen mit <link><linkText>Python-Tools für Visual Studio[]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Voraussetzungen
trans-unit.target: Voraussetzungen

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2012 oder 2013
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2012 oder 2013

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>2.1 der Python-Tools für Visual Studio[]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>2.1 der Python-Tools für Visual Studio[]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Azure SDK-Tools für VS 2013[]</linkText><title></title></link> oder <link><linkText>Azure SDK-Tools für VS-2012[]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Azure SDK-Tools für VS 2013[]</linkText><title></title></link> oder <link><linkText>Azure SDK-Tools für VS-2012[]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Python 2.7 32-bit[]</linkText><title></title></link> oder <link><linkText>Python 3.4 32-bit[]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Python 2.7 32-bit[]</linkText><title></title></link> oder <link><linkText>Python 3.4 32-bit[]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: [AZURBLAU.
trans-unit.target: [AZURBLAU.

trans-unit.source: ENTHALTEN <link><linkText>Konto-und-Websites-Notiz</linkText><title></title></link>]
trans-unit.target: ENTHALTEN <link><linkText>Konto-und-Websites-Notiz</linkText><title></title></link>]

trans-unit.source: Was sind Python Web und Worker Rollen?
trans-unit.target: Was sind Python Web und Worker Rollen?

trans-unit.source: Azurblau bietet drei Modelle zum Ausführen von Anwendungen zu berechnen: <link><linkText>Himmelblau-Websites[execution model-web sites]</linkText><title></title></link>, <link><linkText>Azurblaue virtueller Maschinen[execution model-vms]</linkText><title></title></link>, und <link><linkText>Azure Cloud Services[execution model-cloud services]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Azurblau bietet drei Modelle zum Ausführen von Anwendungen zu berechnen: <link><linkText>Himmelblau-Websites[execution model-web sites]</linkText><title></title></link>, <link><linkText>Azurblaue virtueller Maschinen[execution model-vms]</linkText><title></title></link>, und <link><linkText>Azure Cloud Services[execution model-cloud services]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: All three models support Python.
trans-unit.target: All three models support Python.

trans-unit.source: Cloud Services, which include web and worker roles, provide Platform as a Service (PaaS).
trans-unit.target: Cloud Services, which include web and worker roles, provide Platform as a Service (PaaS).

trans-unit.source: Innerhalb einer Cloud-Service bietet eine Webserverrolle ein dedizierten Webservers für Internet Information Services (IIS) von Host-Front-End-Web-Anwendungen, während eine Arbeiter-Rolle asynchrone, lang andauernde oder unbefristete Aufgaben unabhängig von Benutzerinteraktionen oder Eingabe ausgeführt werden kann.
trans-unit.target: Innerhalb einer Cloud-Service bietet eine Webserverrolle ein dedizierten Webservers für Internet Information Services (IIS) von Host-Front-End-Web-Anwendungen, während eine Arbeiter-Rolle asynchrone, lang andauernde oder unbefristete Aufgaben unabhängig von Benutzerinteraktionen oder Eingabe ausgeführt werden kann.

trans-unit.source: Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter [Was ist ein Cloud-Service?].
trans-unit.target: Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter [Was ist ein Cloud-Service?].

trans-unit.source: [AZURBLAU.
trans-unit.target: [AZURBLAU.

trans-unit.source: HINWEIS] Looking to build a simple website?
trans-unit.target: HINWEIS] Looking to build a simple website?

trans-unit.source: If your scenario involves just a simple website front-end, consider using a lightweight Azure Website.
trans-unit.target: If your scenario involves just a simple website front-end, consider using a lightweight Azure Website.

trans-unit.source: You can easily upgrade to a Cloud Service as your website grows and your requirements change.
trans-unit.target: You can easily upgrade to a Cloud Service as your website grows and your requirements change.

trans-unit.source: See the <html></html>Python Developer Center<html></html> for articles that cover development of Azure Websites.
trans-unit.target: See the <html></html>Python Developer Center<html></html> for articles that cover development of Azure Websites.

trans-unit.source: Project creation
trans-unit.target: Project creation

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, you can select Azure Cloud Service in the New Project dialog, under Python.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, you can select Azure Cloud Service in the New Project dialog, under Python.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>New Project Dialog</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>New Project Dialog</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Cloud Service wizard, you can select to create new web and worker roles.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Cloud Service wizard, you can select to create new web and worker roles.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Azure Cloud Service Dialog</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Azure Cloud Service Dialog</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The worker role template comes with boilerplate code to connect to a Azure storage account or service bus.
trans-unit.target: The worker role template comes with boilerplate code to connect to a Azure storage account or service bus.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Cloud Service Solution</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Cloud Service Solution</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You can add web or worker roles to an existing cloud service at any time.
trans-unit.target: You can add web or worker roles to an existing cloud service at any time.

trans-unit.source: You can choose to add existing projects in your solution, or create new ones.
trans-unit.target: You can choose to add existing projects in your solution, or create new ones.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Add Role Command</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Add Role Command</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Your cloud service can contain roles implemented in different languages.
trans-unit.target: Your cloud service can contain roles implemented in different languages.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can have a Python web role implemented using Django, with Python and C# worker roles.
trans-unit.target: For example, you can have a Python web role implemented using Django, with Python and C# worker roles.

trans-unit.source: You can easily communicate between your roles using service bus queues or storage queues.
trans-unit.target: You can easily communicate between your roles using service bus queues or storage queues.

trans-unit.source: Run locally
trans-unit.target: Run locally

trans-unit.source: If you set your cloud service project as the startup project and press F5, the cloud service will run in the local Azure emulator.
trans-unit.target: If you set your cloud service project as the startup project and press F5, the cloud service will run in the local Azure emulator.

trans-unit.source: Although PTVS supports launching in the emulator, debugging (breakpoints, etc) will not work.
trans-unit.target: Although PTVS supports launching in the emulator, debugging (breakpoints, etc) will not work.

trans-unit.source: To debug your web and worker roles, you can set the role project as the startup project and debug that instead.
trans-unit.target: To debug your web and worker roles, you can set the role project as the startup project and debug that instead.

trans-unit.source: You can also set multiple startup projects.
trans-unit.target: You can also set multiple startup projects.

trans-unit.source: Right-click on the solution and select Set StartUp Projects.
trans-unit.target: Right-click on the solution and select Set StartUp Projects.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Solution Startup Project Properties</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Solution Startup Project Properties</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Publish to Azure
trans-unit.target: Publish to Azure

trans-unit.source: To publish, right-click on the cloud service project in the solution and select Publish.
trans-unit.target: To publish, right-click on the cloud service project in the solution and select Publish.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Microsoft Azure Publish Sign In</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Microsoft Azure Publish Sign In</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the settings page, select the cloud service you want to publish to.
trans-unit.target: In the settings page, select the cloud service you want to publish to.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Microsoft Azure Publish Settings</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Microsoft Azure Publish Settings</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You can create a new cloud service if you don't already have one available.
trans-unit.target: You can create a new cloud service if you don't already have one available.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Create Cloud Service Dialog</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Create Cloud Service Dialog</linkText>

trans-unit.source: It's also useful to enable remote desktop connections to the machine(s) for debugging failures.
trans-unit.target: It's also useful to enable remote desktop connections to the machine(s) for debugging failures.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Remote Desktop Configuration Dialog</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Remote Desktop Configuration Dialog</linkText>

trans-unit.source: When you are done configuring settings, click Publish.
trans-unit.target: When you are done configuring settings, click Publish.

trans-unit.source: Some progress will appear in the output window, then you'll see the Microsoft Azure Activity Log window.
trans-unit.target: Some progress will appear in the output window, then you'll see the Microsoft Azure Activity Log window.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Microsoft Azure Activity Log Window</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Microsoft Azure Activity Log Window</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Deployment will take several minutes to complete, then your web and/or worker roles will be running on Azure!
trans-unit.target: Deployment will take several minutes to complete, then your web and/or worker roles will be running on Azure!

trans-unit.source: Die nächsten Schritte
trans-unit.target: Die nächsten Schritte

trans-unit.source: For more detailed information on working with web and worker roles in Python Tools for Visual Studio, see the PTVS documentation:
trans-unit.target: For more detailed information on working with web and worker roles in Python Tools for Visual Studio, see the PTVS documentation:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Cloud Service Projects[]</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Cloud Service Projects[]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: For more details on using Azure services from your web and worker roles, such as using Azure storage or service bus, see the following guides:
trans-unit.target: For more details on using Azure services from your web and worker roles, such as using Azure storage or service bus, see the following guides:

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Queue Service[]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Service Bus Queues[]</linkText><title></title></link>
